title: Why Sisyphus Simulator?
content:
I missed that meme so much, that shit was the funniest thing ever exist that time. 

  I decided to do a simulator on it. It was just a simple clicker game, nothing fancy.

title: Starting Over: 2025 Website Revival
content:
I abandoned this site back in 2024. Too busy. Too unsure. And the original file got deleted. But now, I'm back â€” rebuilding it from scratch on my phone (Tecno Spark 20 Pro 5G, if you care).

 I used code studio, and then I switched from cracked Trebedit, and I finally shifted to Acode since they have a plugins here and it's a VS studio for mobile.
